Header.title: Desi Charge
Header.paragraph: Now sit back and earn cashback on every recharge.

About.paragraph: Desi Charge is a desi utility app, which helps you to get more out of every recharge, recharge your mobile or tv dish with so many exciting offers, and easy to use.

Services.name: Mobile Recharge
Services.text: Recharge your mobile right now and get amazing offers and earn cashback on every recharge.

Services.name: Electricity Bill
Services.text: Pay your electricity monthly bill(s) regularly. Coming Soon

Services.name: Water Bill
Services.text: Pay your water bill regularly and earn cashback. Coming Soon
